page.title: 13FAMILY LIFE IN WOOBURN GREEN
page.content: Average time living in area-10 yrs. Average number of children per family-2 50% work locally.25% commute to London. 25% use local bus service.80% travel to work by car.66% have more than one car per family.90% of families have both parents at work.95% use local shops.90% use local library.75% read local news- paper.Most popular daily newspaper- Telegraph,Mail,Express.50% support local festival.50% grow own produce.48% own pets.99% own their homes.The most popular T.V.programme-B.B.C.1.50% spend their holidays abroad.40% holiday at home.10% take no holidays.50% have more than one holiday a year.
